name: Ladies Shoe
subtitle: Niche product website
description1: A good looking SPA website by react. There are many page in this website. User will get all the information about the service.
description2: If users login then they can go to the dashboard and manage some tasks. Like he can see my orders, pay, add a review. Reviews are dynamic. After reviewing, the reviews will be added to the review section of the home page.
description3: Admin can make another user an admin, if he wants.
description4: There is an Admin panel. An admin can also manage some tasks. Like adding products, managing products, managing orders etc.
description5: If the user doesn't login, click the purchase button then he will go to the login page. And after login success he will go to the purchase page automatically.

name: World Travel
subtitle: Tourism related website
description1: This is a favorite web site for those who love to travel. Through this website travelers will be able to get various information about travel.
description2: This web site service is to help people travel. Here are the packages for different places. By looking at these packages, they can arrange the travel of the beavers.
description3: Allowing users to create accounts, browse packages, book packages and manage all services that he booked. Users also delete services from his booking services.
description4: There are options for admin to add services and manage services.
description5: Users will be able to know about the services by visiting the about page and contact with manager or admin by visiting the contact us page.

name: Mother & Child General Hospital
subtitle: Healthcare related website
description1: This is a good looking and responsive website. On this website there are many services for patients.
description2: The mind is intimately involved with the body so Mother ans Child General Hospital believes both body and mind need equal care. That's why Mother and Child General Hospital is working to make it easier for people to get all the services related to physical and mental health from one place.
description3: Users can register with an email-password or login with google or github.
description4: After successful login, users can take the visit. After doing everything, the user can log out if he wants.
description5: By visiting the contact us page, users can know all information about the services. There is a departments page and users can browse all departments.
